mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT hsp.hospital_id, hsp.hospital_name, hsp.hospital_address, hsp.hospital_organ_loc, hcm.hospital_category_name, hsp.hospital_phone, hsp.hospital_latitude, hsp.hospital_longitude, hoh.start_time, hoh.end_time FROM hospital AS hsp LEFT OUTER JOIN hospital_operating_hours hoh ON hsp.hospital_id = hoh.hospital_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT hsc.hospital_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT hcm.hospital_category_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS hospital_category_name FROM hospital_category hsc LEFT JOIN hospital_category_mst hcm ON hsc.hospital_category_id = hcm.hospital_category_id GROUP BY hsc.hospital_id ) AS hcm ON hsp.hospital_id = hcm.hospital_id WHERE hsp.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} AND hoh.day_of_week = DAYNAME(STR_TO_DATE(#{nowDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'));

SELECT hsp.hospital_id, hsp.hospital_name, hsp.hospital_address, hsp.hospital_organ_loc, COUNT(*) OVER() AS total_count, hcm.hospital_category_name, hoh.start_time, hoh.end_time FROM hospital AS hsp LEFT OUTER JOIN hospital_operating_hours hoh ON hsp.hospital_id = hoh.hospital_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT hsc.hospital_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT hcm.hospital_category_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS hospital_category_name FROM hospital_category hsc LEFT JOIN hospital_category_mst hcm ON hsc.hospital_category_id = hcm.hospital_category_id GROUP BY hsc.hospital_id ) AS hcm ON hsp.hospital_id = hcm.hospital_id WHERE hsp.hospital_type != '약국' AND hsp.hospital_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%') AND hoh.day_of_week = DAYNAME(STR_TO_DATE(#{nowDay}, '%Y-%m-%d')) AND #{hospitalOpen} BETWEEN hoh.start_time AND hoh.end_time AND hoh.end_time > #{nightOpen} AND hsp.hospital_emergency = #{emergency} AND hcm.hospital_category_name = #{department} LIMIT #{page}, 20;
SELECT hoh.day_of_week, hoh.start_time, hoh.end_time FROM hospital AS hos LEFT OUTER JOIN hospital_operating_hours hoh ON hos.hospital_id = hoh.hospital_id WHERE hos.hospital_id = #{hospitalId};
